Meetup Location: Cumberland Farms, 2643 Hartford Ave, Johnston RI  at 0800am

 

Guys, I'm going to plan a day trip to the scenic Litchfield Hills in Northwest CT. Several portions of this ride were called some of the most scenic rides in America! We will ride through long rolling hills, beautiful farmland, quaint small towns, lakes/rivers, and of course nice twisties!

We will take Route 6 through RI and across CT almost entirely to Litchfield. I take Route 6 very often to Hartford for my job and it's a nice country road where we can really twist the throttle to Hartford. From Litchfield we'll take 202 west to 45 north to 341 west to 7 north and then finally on to 44 east. Once we reach 44 we'll take that back across CT to RI. Route 44 from Hartford to RI is also designated as a scenic road.

Basically this whole ride will be backroads and country settings!! We will be riding over 400 miles, so I'd like to meetup early. We'll meet at 7:00am and kick stands are up by 7:15am. This is an all day ride, I'm planning to be back in Boston by 6 or 7pm. Any questions or suggestions call me 617 817 1136. Don't miss out! Check out the Google Map below.
